name: music-api-cypress-tests
description: Cypress E2E tests for Music API with Cloud Dashboard

scripts.test:auth:core: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js'
scripts.test:auth:core:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js' --record --tag 'auth,core'
scripts.test:auth:security: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js'
scripts.test:auth:security:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' --record --tag 'auth,security'
scripts.test:auth:all: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js'
scripts.test:auth:all:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'auth,full-suite'
scripts.test:users:api: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:users:api:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js' --record --tag 'users,api'
scripts.test:users:favorites: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:users:favorites:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' --record --tag 'users,favorites'
scripts.test:users:all: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:users:all:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'users,full-suite'
scripts.test:artists:core: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js'
scripts.test:artists:core:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js' --record --tag 'artists,core'
scripts.test:artists:integration: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:artists:integration:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --record --tag 'artists,integration'
scripts.test:artists:all: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:artists:all:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'artists,full-suite'
scripts.test:core: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js'
scripts.test:core:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'core,critical-path'
scripts.test:integration: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:integration:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'integration,complex-flows'
scripts.test:security: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js'
scripts.test:security:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' --record --tag 'security,vulnerability-scan'
scripts.test:flow:basic: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:flow:basic:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'flow,basic-user-journey'
scripts.test:flow:complete: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:flow:complete:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'flow,complete-e2e'
scripts.test:flow:auth-first: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:flow:auth-first:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'flow,auth-security-first'
scripts.test:all: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:all:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js,**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js,**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --record --parallel --tag 'full-regression,all-tests'
scripts.test:smoke: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js'
scripts.test:smoke:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js' --record --tag 'smoke,health-check'
scripts.test:parallel:auth: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' --parallel
scripts.test:parallel:auth:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js,**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' --parallel --record --tag 'parallel,auth'
scripts.test:parallel:users: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' --parallel
scripts.test:parallel:users:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js,**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' --parallel --record --tag 'parallel,users'
scripts.test:parallel:artists: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --parallel
scripts.test:parallel:artists:cloud: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js,**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js' --parallel --record --tag 'parallel,artists'
scripts.test:sequential:auth: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js'
scripts.test:sequential:users: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js'
scripts.test:sequential:artists: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.test:sequential:all: npm run wake-up && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-core.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/auth/auth-security.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/user-api-tests.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/users/favorites-api-tests.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-core.cy.js' && cypress run --browser chrome --spec '**/artists/artists-integration.cy.js'
scripts.setup:cloud: echo 'Setting up Cypress Cloud...' && cypress run --record --key $CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY || echo 'Please set CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY and CYPRESS_PROJECT_ID environment variables'

author: QA Automation Team
